Edmond.KAUT-TV: KAUT-TV, virtual channel 43 (UHF digital channel 40), is an independent television station licensed to Oklahoma City, Oklahoma, United States. The station is owned by the Tribune Broadcasting subsidiary of Tribune Media, as part of a duopoly with NBC affiliate KFOR-TV (channel 4). The two stations share studio and transmitter facilities located on East Britton Road (U.S. 77) in the McCourry Heights section of northeast Oklahoma City.
